data.message: Why the fuck is em re releasing shit on cassette tape ! No body gives a fuck about or even owns those things anymore. We want new music Marshall!!

replies.message: He's probably just trying to get his name out again so he can release a new album. He has been in the studio a lot lately so he's most likely been working on an album. We will probably get an announcement in summer.
Arvid Sörensen lets hope so man .. We all no he doesn't need a re introduction tho .. Still the goat
Naw b em was always broke living where I live Detroit Michigan all he loved was cassettes pretty sure when he was young that's all he had its retro maine

Yeah we grew up listening to cassettes because that's all we had except 8 tracks if you're old enough to remember those but it doesn't mean we want a cassette tape who in the hell has anything to play it on..if you do I fuckin applaud you!
The same with CD players I still got mines
